data.title: Facts about Lee Hyeri, Ryu Jun Yeol's Former Girlfriend Who Has Been the Backbone of the Family Since Young
data.meta_description: Lately, Han So Hee, Ryu Jun Yeol, and Hyeri have been widely discussed on social media.
data.text:
Kapanlagi.com - Unpleasant news comes from South Korean actress and singer, Hyeri. Her love story with actor Ryu Jun Yeol has ended after seven years of dating. Their love story began on the set of the Korean drama Reply 1988. Hyeri, known as one of South Korea's celebrities with many fans, is not only known as a KPop idol and a member of Girl's Day, but also as an actress.

However, her childhood was marked by financial difficulties, which she revealed in a reality show. Nevertheless, she managed to overcome it well and has now become the responsible backbone of the family.

Want to know more about Hyeri? Here are some interesting facts about her. Summarized on Wednesday (20/03/2024).

1. Personnel from the Girl's Day Girl Group

(Source: Instagram @hyeri_0609)

Lee Hyeri emerged as a public figure when she made her debut as one of the members of Girl's Day, an idol group that debuted in 2010 under Dream Tea Entertainment management.

In the group, Hyeri took the position of vocalist and also as the maknae, the youngest member. She joined Dream Tea Entertainment agency after being directly recruited by them while performing on a talent show.

2. Building Friendship with Rosé from Blackpink

(Source: Instagram @hyeri_0609)

In terms of celebrity friendships, Hyeri is known to be close to many younger celebrity friends, such as Chaewon Lee Serafim, Miyeon from G-Idle, and solo singer Yena.

However, among them all, Hyeri is closest to Blackpink member, Rosé. On an episode of "Amazing Saturday", Rosé shared how their friendship began.

At that time, Rosé had just debuted with Blackpink and wanted to get to know Hyeri better as a senior in the entertainment industry. Hyeri warmly welcomed Rosé, leading to their closeness forming quickly.

3. Known as Nation's Little Sister

(Source: Instagram @hyeri_0609)

Known for her cheerful personality and adorable charm, Hyeri is often referred to as Nation's Little Sister by the Korean media. This title started to stick to Hyeri after her appearance on the military show 'Real Men' in 2014.

Aside from Hyeri, this nickname is also held by several other Korean artists such as IU and Kim So Hyun.

4. Becoming the Backbone of the Family

(Source: Instagram @hyeri_0609)

This actress and idol's hard work has finally paid off. Currently, Hyeri has become the backbone of her family, and they are no longer in need. She not only supports her family, but also frequently donates her earnings to charity programs.

All of Hyeri's dreams have come true, even though she came from a less privileged family. Through her success as a singer and actress, Hyeri has been called the "10 billion Won girl" for starring in dozens of commercials.

5. Her Mother Works as a Factory Worker

(Source: Instagram @hyeri_0609)

In the tvN Taxi variety show, Hyeri revealed that since she was young, she has aspired to be successful. This is because her mother has been supporting the family by working as a factory worker.

Her mother has worked in the factory for 15 years. Inspired by her mother's struggle, Hyeri is determined to achieve success and relentlessly pursue her dreams.

6. Organized Individual

(Source: Instagram @hyeri_0609)

Although known as a cheerful person, Hyeri is actually someone who is organized and meticulous with her belongings.

In an interview with GQ Korea, Hyeri revealed that she never loses her belongings.

She even keeps a complete list of her activities on her phone's memo.

7. Having a Strong Work Ethic

(Source: Instagram @hyeri_0609)

Hyeri has been working hard since her teenage years. The woman from Gwangju went through a long trainee period before finally being able to debut.

This did not happen without reason, because Hyeri has the determination and willingness to work hard. This is because she was born into a lower middle-class family in South Korea.

Hyeri once talked about this when she was a guest on the tvN Taxi variety show. She revealed her difficult childhood because her family experienced poverty.

Since she was young, Hyeri has been determined to repay her parents' hard work.

8. No Longer in a Relationship with Ryu Jun Yeol

(Source: Instagram @hyeri_0609)

It turns out that love between Hyeri and Ryu Jun Yeol began to grow when they both starred in the drama Reply 1988. They eventually entered into a romantic relationship, which was fully supported by their fans.

The harmony and longevity of their relationship impressed many people. However, in November 2023, sad news mentioned that after eight years together, they decided to break up.

9. Likes Funny Men with Broad Shoulders

(Source: Instagram @hyeri_0609)

Hyeri has mentioned the criteria for the man of her dreams. In terms of personality and appearance, it turns out that Hyeri likes men who are funny with broad shoulders.

On the other hand, Hyeri also stated that men like that are similar to the idol she admires, Kim Tae Pyung or better known as Hyun Bin.

10. Success at a Young Age

(Source: Instagram @hyeri_0609)

Lee Hyeri started her debut as a member of the KPop girl group at the age of 16 in 2010. Together with Sojin, Minah, and Yura, they formed Girl's Day and became brand ambassadors for 20 brands in South Korea throughout their career.

In addition to her singing career, Hyeri is also active in the acting world, making her debut in Korean dramas in 2012 with the title Tasty Life. Her career continues to grow and reached its peak when she starred in Reply 1988.

11. How long did Hyeri date?

The relationship between Hyeri of Girl's Day and Ryu Jun-yeol ended after dating for about seven years.

12. Have Ryu Jun Yeol and Hyeri broken up?

Ryu Jun Yeol and Hyeri officially announced their breakup in November 2023, contrary to Han So Hee's statement that they broke up in June.

13. Who is Hyeri's friend?

Lee Se Young is Hyeri's close friend in the Korean drama Reply 1988 who underwent total plastic surgery on her face. This comedian switched professions to become a model and YouTuber.

14. Who is Rose's Best Friend from Blackpink?

It is known that Hyeri from Girl's Day is Rose's close friend.

15. Why is Rose called Lastri?

Rose BLACKPINK started being called "Lastri" because she turned around when called by that name at a concert.
